botIsNotReady: Bug: DiscordJS Client is not really ready
botTokenUndefined: Bug: Discord API token is not defined
SC_interactionNotComplete: The recieved interaction is missing elements to be correctly handled. Please retry.
SC_notConnectedToVoice: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command
SC_bug:
Sorry but I could not fulfilled your command.
Please retry or contact an admin.
SC_hide_commandDescription: Move you to the hidden voice channel
SC_hide_noHiddenChannel: This guild does not have a hidden Voice Channel
SC_math_optionDescription: exp or log_e : nonzero integer number
SC_math_didNotComputeAValue: Huh, I didn't understood what you want me to do. Please retry or contact an admin.
SC_random_cat_commandDescription: Get a picture of a very cute kitty
SC_random_number_commandDescription: Return a random number between maxima
SC_random_list_commandDescription: Pick a word from a sentence
SC_shifumi_victory1: Take that in your little human face!
SC_shifumi_draw2: What?! Are you reading my circuit boards?
SC_shifumi_draw3: I'm four parallel universes ahead of you!
SC_playtrack_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : PLAY | Unpause the audio player or add a media to play
SC_playtrack_optionDescription: URL from the media to play or keywords to search on YouTube
SC_playsound_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : PLAYSOUND | Play a handpicked sound
SC_pause_commandDescription$1: ${botName Audio Player : PAUSE | Pause the audio player
SC_stop_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : STOP | End the audio player
SC_next_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : NEXT | End the current media and play the next media (if there is one)
SC_radio_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : RADIO | Add a radio from RadioGarden to the audio player
SC_radio_optionDescription: Search a radio station by its name or use the direct radio RadioGarden link
SC_localradio_commandDescription$1: ${botName} Audio Player : LOCALRADIO | Add a handpicked radio not available on RadioGarden
SC_localradio_optionDescription: Pick a radio organically grown near from you
BT_delete_label$1: This message will be deleted in ${duration} seconds
MP_GUI_audioFetchFailed: Failed to play this media, please check the source or retry
MP_Button_stopYesLabel: Stop and delete the current playlist
MP_Button_stopQuestion: Do you really wish to stop the Music Player?
MP_failedToExecuteCommand$1: You must join a voice channel (or be in the same than ${botName}) in this Guild to use that command
MP_Playlist_question: What do want to do with this playlist track?
MP_Playlist_nextLabel: Move to the top of the playlist
MP_Playlist_requestRoger:
Roger that.
You can now dismiss this message
MP_PlaytrackSearchError$1: No media found on YouTube for {${query}}
MP_RadioNonValidLink$1: The provied URL isn't a direct radio station link from RadioGarden: {${query}}
MP_RadioSearchError$1: No media found on RadioGarden or search failed for {${query}}
